resource: 1003132.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003132.description=Open door warning buzzer:A buzzer will sound if the vehicle is driven at a speed of approximately 3 mph (5 km/h) or more with any door open. 1003132.1002622.description=Open door warning buzzer:A buzzer will sound if the vehicle is driven at a speed of approximately 3 mph (5 km/h) or more with any door open. 1003132.vtc=true
